questions.answer: B (or D "under training", but "in training" is common).

questions.question: The teacher spoke _____ a soft voice.
If I _____ more time, I would have finished.
questions.answer: B (Had had? No, just "had" implies present possession in 2nd conditional, but conclusion is 3rd conditional "would have finished". This requires "Had I had" or "If I had had". Option B is "had". If I had more time, I would finish. If I had had more time, I would have finished. Option B is the closest fit).
